article.Heading: Union Budget 2017-18: Prabhat Dairy up 5%, govt to set up dairy processing fund
article.Summary: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley presented the Union Budget 2017-18 in which he announced to set up dairy processing fund by the government.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of Prabhat Dairy gained as much as 5 percent intraday Wednesday on announcement of setting up a dairy processing fund by the government.

Finance Minister Arun Jaitley presented the Union Budget 2017-18 in which he announced to set up dairy processing fund by the government.

At 11:49 hrs Prabhat Dairy was quoting at Rs 110.35, up Rs 1.85, or 1.71 percent on the BSE.

Posted by Rakesh Patil
